title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6
notes: It launches normally but goes to a black screen before the main menu appears.
gpuDriver: Mesa (The one from Steam's last announcement)

title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6
notes: When the game opened, some pop-ups showed up as usual when people usually open the game for the first time and right after that, my laptop screen just went black and just the mouse pointer was visible. I waited a while but nothing happened so I closed the game. I didn't do any kind of workaround

title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6
notes:
When I start up RE6, it installs Microsoft Direct X for Windows, loads up with initial warning splashscreens. Press 'OK' twice and then go to blank screen that makes GPU fire up and game hits 100fps (steam fps counter)

Left game running for 5mins. Nothing else beyond this currently.
Stuck at black screen before main menu. wmp is required by game but cannot find a way to install it on Proton wine drive (Windows 7 64bits from what I found out)
title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6

notes: Works perfectly after the following workaround: must unzip RE 6 movie.rar, downloaded from https://drive.google.com/file/d/1DxFBxQ-PEhLorrdOeTyB6nW-qzSlQYE3/view , inside the folder Steam/steamapps/common/Resident Evil 6/nativePC/movie. After that, runs flawlessly (tested Campaign and The Mercenaries, both with maxed out graphics).
title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6

notes: After applying fix with movies, game passed through black screen to main menu. Performance is nearly perfect, except long loadings and random spikes.
title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6

notes: After applying fix with movies, game works very well.
title: Resident Evil 6 / Biohazard 6
